definition: ability/talent/sb of a certain type/a capable individual/only/only then/just now
gas/air/smell/weather/to make angry/to annoy/to get angry/vital energy/qi
an outstanding talent (idiom)/surpassing insight and acumen

sentences.english: I am a talented worrier, too.
sentences.chinese: 但我也是個才氣橫溢的愛發愁的人。

sentences.english: Li Bai was a Tang poet of superb talent.
sentences.chinese: 李白是唐代一位才氣橫溢的詩人。

sentences.english: Heas a very efficient young man though just some proud.
sentences.chinese: 他是個很有才氣的人，但是有點傲岸。

sentences.english: Science offers us total mastery over environment and over our destiny.
sentences.chinese: 科教付與我們節制環境把握運氣的才氣。

sentences.english: BRILLIANT】Everyone likes to hear him, he is a brilliant speaker.
sentences.chinese: 每個人都喜歡聽他說話，他是個有才氣的演說家。

sentences.english: Having knowledge likes having pregnant, it takes times to be awareness.
sentences.chinese: 懷才就像有身，時刻長了才氣看出來。

sentences.english: He left for New York on business until next Monday.
sentences.chinese: 他去紐約辦差去了，要下週一才氣回來。

sentences.english: By your talent, out of their mix, were long overdue.
sentences.chinese: 憑你的才氣，出來自己混，早就該發了。

sentences.english: Sit quietly until the bell rings.
sentences.chinese: 安靜坐好，鈴響才氣下課。

sentences.english: Hehas ppowericularly efficient young man though just some proud.
sentences.chinese: 他是個很有才氣的人，但是有點驕矜。

sentences.english: Then, nike air 90, enforcement could become self-financing.
sentences.chinese: 只有如許，執法才氣在財務上自力更生。

sentences.english: It might be being brilliant with rotas or budgets or understanding the system.
sentences.chinese: 如果會做值班表或預算或瞭解系統，也很有才氣。

sentences.english: Sleep is a learned behavior, and getting into a routine helps the process.
sentences.chinese: 睡眠是一位才氣橫溢的行爲，並進入一個例行的步調。

definition: refined and elegant attitude of mind
old verse/poetry in the old style
vigor of strokes in calligraphy or drawing/vigor of style in literary composition

(last line of the poem 望岳 by Tang poet Du Fu 杜甫[Du4 Fu3]) with one look I shall see all the smaller mountains down below (from the summit of Mt Tai 泰山[Tai4 Shan1])/(fig.) awe-inspiring view from a very high place
